title: FM visits UK High Commission to convey condolences over Queen’s demise
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sept 9 (APP): Foreign Minister Bilawal Bhutto Zardari visited the British High Commission here on Friday to express his condolences over the passing of Queen Elizabeth-II.
He signed the condolence book at UK High Commission to convey Pakistan’s profound sympathies on passing of The Queen.
“I noted that her demise is a tremendous loss not only for people of UK but for all citizens of Commonwealth family which benefited from her leadership & wisdom for 70 years,” the Foreign Minister said in a twitter post.
